sentences.en: He jumped into the lake, out of pure exhibitionism.
sentences.cn: 他跳进湖里, 完全是为了出风头.

sentences.en: She was embarrassed by his exhibitionism at the party.
sentences.cn: 他在聚会上竭力表现自己使她感到很难堪.

sentences.en: There is an element of exhibitionism in the parents' performance too.
sentences.cn: 那对父母的表现也显得有些爱出风头。

words.tran_cn: 展览，显示；展览会；展览品
展出者；获得奖学金的学生
裸露症患者；倾向自我宣传的人；喜欢出风头的人

trans.tran_en: a medical condition that makes someone want to show their sexual organs in public places
